text: Aravind Bolar (born January 4, 1966) is an Indian film actor who primarily works in Tulu , Kannada language films, . Bolar began his career in Yakshagana initially. He acted in 100 plays and 20 films == Personal life == Aravind Bolar born to Kirshnaapa Belchad and Sundari in Bolar in Mangalore district, Karnataka, India.
